import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-welcom-msg', templateUrl: './welcom-msg.component.html', styleUrls: ['./welcom-msg.component.css'], }) export class WelcomMsgComponent { @Input('isLoggedIn') isLoggedIn = false; }
